title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma & more models wrapped in a Go CLI/API server.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client library for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs, embeddings, tool-calling agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI that talks to local Ollama instance.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with builders, streaming, async support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing ergonomic async bindings to Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local LLM code completion via Ollama.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat interface served by a Go backend talking to Ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI with readline, history, markdown rendering.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client library for Ollama with streaming chat & embeddings.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin for code generation, explanation, and chat using Ollama.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app wrapping Ollama REST calls with async views & admin UI.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration injecting Ollama client beans.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Lightweight Alpine-based multi-arch Docker image for Ollama server.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community registry of custom Modelfile recipes (Llava, StarCoder, etc.).

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside your vault.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot that chats with any Ollama model via webhook polling.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting Ollama serve as generator & embedder in RAG pipelines.
